summary: PWA crypto analytics app with frontend-only Binance data fetching and backend CoinGecko integration. Adding buy/sell point analysis and stop loss calculation features.
architectural_notes: Frontend fetches all Binance data directly from browser (required due to Binance blocking data center IPs)
Backend uses only CoinGecko API and internal storage
All real-time analysis must use frontend data only
ICP canisters use IPv6 which Binance blocks - no backend Binance calls allowed
known_issues: Deployment failures occur when backend attempts Binance HTTP calls due to IP blocking
Must maintain strict separation: Binance in frontend only, CoinGecko in backend only

existing_features.title: When a user selects an asset from the Opportunities list, display the optimal buy point (entry price) calculated from current market data and technical analysis already available in the frontend
Display the most probable sell point (take profit target) for the selected asset based on volatility, momentum, and technical indicators already computed in the frontend
Calculate and display a stop loss price for the selected asset using risk management rules based on ATR, support levels, or percentage-based logic already available in frontend technical analysis
Ensure all new entry/exit/stop loss calculations use only data already fetched by the frontend from Binance and do not trigger any new backend HTTP calls to Binance

new_feature_requests.summary: Show optimal buy point, probable sell point, and calculated stop loss for selected assets based on existing data
